readable.title: 3157039116_d82da4e66b
readable.content: A blond hair boy in short , short sleeve shirt and sandals in overlooking a snowcapped mountain . A boy in a blue shirt is standing at the foot of a hill with a snowball in his hand . A boy in a t-shirt and shorts is holding a snowball and facing a snowy mountain . A boy preparing to throw a snowball A child in shorts throws a snowball at a mountain .
